description:
Mana is Yorito`s friend from school; she often gets annoyed at Yorito for how he spends so much time taking photographs of the sky instead of spending more time with his sister. Mana works as a waitress at the Azur Restaurant and often comes over to Yorito`s house to cook for him. She looks after her younger sister Koyori. She also knows about Matsuri`s secret.
She eventually takes up Yorito`s hobby of taking pictures of clouds in the early morning, although she has no more memories of him.
name: Ishizuki Mana
